A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the theater angry thinking that whoever wrote this was not a Star Wars fan. In fact\,it feels so off I'd almost guess he had a complete disdain for it.  Some good visuals. I like all the characters\, escoecially Rey but the plot was ridiculous and the screenwriting was cheap and lazy. Thanks\, Disney. You've exceeded my expectations. And not in s good way. I've been a lifelong fan and have seen every movie in the theater multiple  times.  I doubt I'll see this one again and Rian's basically erased any point of watching the next one. What a pile of crap.
